description: The committee wants to safeguard The Guernsey Institute and set out which models will be reviewed.
title: Guernsey secondary education review 'needs clarity'
title_page: Guernsey secondary education review 'needs clarity' - BBC News
maintext: The Education, Sport and Culture president said while those who called for the review said it was not intended to stop work on The Guernsey Institute the wording of their motion meant "incompatible" models would be considered.
